item.title: Sunshine uPMU Data
item.description: The primary synchrophasor dataset that is currently available in the NI4AI platform is from 6 topologically related uPMUs measuring data intermittently from 2015-2017. The dataset was collected for academic power engineering research and has been anonymized to remove sensitive and location-specific information. Because it was the first dataset to be made public on the platform, we’ve named it the “sunshine” dataset and it can be found in the sunshine/ collection in the plotter.
